/*!-----------------***REMOVED***TypeScript***REMOVED***ThirdPartyNotices***REMOVED***-------------------------------------------------------

The***REMOVED***TypeScript***REMOVED***software***REMOVED***incorporates***REMOVED***third***REMOVED***party***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***projects***REMOVED***listed***REMOVED***below.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***original***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***Microsoft***REMOVED***received***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***third***REMOVED***party***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***below.***REMOVED***Microsoft***REMOVED***reserves***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***granted,***REMOVED***whether***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***implication,***REMOVED***estoppel***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***otherwise.

---------------------------------------------
Third***REMOVED***Party***REMOVED***Code***REMOVED***Components
--------------------------------------------

-------------------***REMOVED***DefinitelyTyped***REMOVED***--------------------
This***REMOVED***file***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***based***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***incorporates***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***projects***REMOVED***listed***REMOVED***below***REMOVED***(collectively***REMOVED***"Third***REMOVED***Party***REMOVED***Code").***REMOVED***Microsoft***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***original***REMOVED***author***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Third***REMOVED***Party***REMOVED***Code.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***original***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***license,***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***Microsoft***REMOVED***received***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***Third***REMOVED***Party***REMOVED***Code,***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***below.***REMOVED***Such***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***notices***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***provided***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***informational***REMOVED***purposes***REMOVED***only.***REMOVED***Microsoft,***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***third***REMOVED***party,***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Third***REMOVED***Party***REMOVED***Code***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***EULA***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Microsoft***REMOVED***Product.***REMOVED***Microsoft***REMOVED***reserves***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***granted***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***agreement,***REMOVED***whether***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***implication,***REMOVED***estoppel***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***otherwise.
DefinitelyTyped
This***REMOVED***project***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***MIT***REMOVED***license.***REMOVED***Copyrights***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***respective***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***each***REMOVED***contributor***REMOVED***listed***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***beginning***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***each***REMOVED***definition***REMOVED***file.***REMOVED***Provided***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***Informational***REMOVED***Purposes***REMOVED***Only

MIT***REMOVED***License
Permission***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***hereby***REMOVED***granted,***REMOVED***free***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***charge,***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***person***REMOVED***obtaining***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***copy***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***software***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***associated***REMOVED***documentation***REMOVED***files***REMOVED***(the***REMOVED***""Software""),***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***deal***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Software***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***restriction,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***limitation***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***use,***REMOVED***copy,***REMOVED***modify,***REMOVED***merge,***REMOVED***publish,***REMOVED***distribute,***REMOVED***sublicense,***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***sell***REMOVED***copies***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Software,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***permit***REMOVED***persons***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***whom***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Software***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***furnished***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***so,***REMOVED***subject***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***conditions:

The***REMOVED***above***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***included***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***copies***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***substantial***REMOVED***portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Software.

THE***REMOVED***SOFTWARE***REMOVED***IS***REMOVED***PROVIDED***REMOVED***"AS***REMOVED***IS",***REMOVED***WITHOUT***REMOVED***WARRANTY***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***KIND,***REMOVED***EXPRESS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IMPLIED,***REMOVED***INCLUDING***REMOVED***BUT***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***LIMITED***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***WARRANTIES***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***MERCHANTABILITY,***REMOVED***FITNESS***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***A***REMOVED***PARTICULAR***REMOVED***PURPOSE***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***NONINFRINGEMENT.***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***NO***REMOVED***EVENT***REMOVED***SHALL***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***AUTHORS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***COPYRIGHT***REMOVED***HOLDERS***REMOVED***BE***REMOVED***LIABLE***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***CLAIM,***REMOVED***DAMAGES***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***LIABILITY,***REMOVED***WHETHER***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***AN***REMOVED***ACTION***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***CONTRACT,***REMOVED***TORT***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHERWISE,***REMOVED***ARISING***REMOVED***FROM,***REMOVED***OUT***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***CONNECTION***REMOVED***WITH***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***SOFTWARE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***USE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***DEALINGS***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***SOFTWARE.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------***REMOVED***Unicode***REMOVED***--------------------
UNICODE,***REMOVED***INC.***REMOVED***LICENSE***REMOVED***AGREEMENT***REMOVED***-***REMOVED***DATA***REMOVED***FILES***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***SOFTWARE

Unicode***REMOVED***Data***REMOVED***Files***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***data***REMOVED***files***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***directories
http://www.unicode.org/Public/,***REMOVED***http://www.unicode.org/reports/,
http://www.unicode.org/cldr/data/,***REMOVED***http://source.icu-project.org/repos/icu/,***REMOVED***and
http://www.unicode.org/utility/trac/browser/.

Unicode***REMOVED***Data***REMOVED***Files***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***PDF***REMOVED***online***REMOVED***code***REMOVED***charts***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the
directory***REMOVED***http://www.unicode.org/Public/.

Software***REMOVED***includes***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***source***REMOVED***code***REMOVED***published***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Unicode***REMOVED***Standard
or***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***directories
http://www.unicode.org/Public/,***REMOVED***http://www.unicode.org/reports/,
http://www.unicode.org/cldr/data/,***REMOVED***http://source.icu-project.org/repos/icu/,***REMOVED***and
http://www.unicode.org/utility/trac/browser/.

NOTICE***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***USER:***REMOVED***Carefully***REMOVED***read***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***legal***REMOVED***agreement.
BY***REMOVED***DOWNLOADING,***REMOVED***INSTALLING,***REMOVED***COPYING***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHERWISE***REMOVED***USING***REMOVED***UNICODE***REMOVED***INC.'S
DATA***REMOVED***FILES***REMOVED***("DATA***REMOVED***FILES"),***REMOVED***AND/OR***REMOVED***SOFTWARE***REMOVED***("SOFTWARE"),
YOU***REMOVED***UNEQUIVOCALLY***REMOVED***ACCEPT,***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***AGREE***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***BE***REMOVED***BOUND***REMOVED***BY,***REMOVED***ALL***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THE
TERMS***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***CONDITIONS***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THIS***REMOVED***AGREEMENT.
IF***REMOVED***YOU***REMOVED***DO***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***AGREE,***REMOVED***DO***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***DOWNLOAD,***REMOVED***INSTALL,***REMOVED***COPY,***REMOVED***DISTRIBUTE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***USE
THE***REMOVED***DATA***REMOVED***FILES***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***SOFTWARE.

COPYRIGHT***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***PERMISSION***REMOVED***NOTICE

Permission***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***hereby***REMOVED***granted,***REMOVED***free***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***charge,***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***person***REMOVED***obtaining
a***REMOVED***copy***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Unicode***REMOVED***data***REMOVED***files***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***associated***REMOVED***documentation
(the***REMOVED***"Data***REMOVED***Files")***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***Unicode***REMOVED***software***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***associated***REMOVED***documentation
(the***REMOVED***"Software")***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***deal***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Data***REMOVED***Files***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***Software
without***REMOVED***restriction,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***limitation***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***use,
copy,***REMOVED***modify,***REMOVED***merge,***REMOVED***publish,***REMOVED***distribute,***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***sell***REMOVED***copies***REMOVED***of
the***REMOVED***Data***REMOVED***Files***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***Software,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***permit***REMOVED***persons***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***whom***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Data***REMOVED***Files
or***REMOVED***Software***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***furnished***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***so,***REMOVED***provided***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***either
(a)***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***appear***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***copies
of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Data***REMOVED***Files***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***Software,***REMOVED***or
(b)***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***appear***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***associated
Documentation.

THE***REMOVED***DATA***REMOVED***FILES***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***SOFTWARE***REMOVED***ARE***REMOVED***PROVIDED***REMOVED***"AS***REMOVED***IS",***REMOVED***WITHOUT***REMOVED***WARRANTY***REMOVED***OF
ANY***REMOVED***KIND,***REMOVED***EXPRESS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IMPLIED,***REMOVED***INCLUDING***REMOVED***BUT***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***LIMITED***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***THE
WARRANTIES***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***MERCHANTABILITY,***REMOVED***FITNESS***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***A***REMOVED***PARTICULAR***REMOVED***PURPOSE***REMOVED***AND
NONINFRINGEMENT***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THIRD***REMOVED***PARTY***REMOVED***RIGHTS.
IN***REMOVED***NO***REMOVED***EVENT***REMOVED***SHALL***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***COPYRIGHT***REMOVED***HOLDER***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***HOLDERS***REMOVED***INCLUDED***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***THIS
NOTICE***REMOVED***BE***REMOVED***LIABLE***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***CLAIM,***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***SPECIAL***REMOVED***INDIRECT***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***CONSEQUENTIAL
DAMAGES,***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***DAMAGES***REMOVED***WHATSOEVER***REMOVED***RESULTING***REMOVED***FROM***REMOVED***LOSS***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***USE,
DATA***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***PROFITS,***REMOVED***WHETHER***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***AN***REMOVED***ACTION***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***CONTRACT,***REMOVED***NEGLIGENCE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER
TORTIOUS***REMOVED***ACTION,***REMOVED***ARISING***REMOVED***OUT***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***CONNECTION***REMOVED***WITH***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***USE***REMOVED***OR
PERFORMANCE***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***DATA***REMOVED***FILES***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***SOFTWARE.

Except***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***contained***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***notice,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***name***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***holder
shall***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***used***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***advertising***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***otherwise***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***promote***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***sale,
use***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***dealings***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***these***REMOVED***Data***REMOVED***Files***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***Software***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***prior
written***REMOVED***authorization***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***holder.

-------------------Document***REMOVED***Object***REMOVED***Model-----------------------------
DOM***REMOVED***

W3C***REMOVED***License
This***REMOVED***work***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***being***REMOVED***provided***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***holders***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***license.
By***REMOVED***obtaining***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***copying***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***work,***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***(the***REMOVED***licensee)***REMOVED***agree***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***read,***REMOVED***understood,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***comply***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions.
Permission***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***copy,***REMOVED***modify,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***distribute***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***work,***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***modification, for***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***purpose***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***fee***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***royalty***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***hereby***REMOVED***granted,***REMOVED***provided***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***
on***REMOVED***ALL***REMOVED***copies***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***work***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***portions***REMOVED***thereof,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***modifications:
****REMOVED***The***REMOVED***full***REMOVED***text***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***NOTICE***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***location***REMOVED***viewable***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***users***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***redistributed***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***derivative***REMOVED***work.
****REMOVED***Any***REMOVED***pre-existing***REMOVED***intellectual***REMOVED***property***REMOVED***disclaimers,***REMOVED***notices,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***none***REMOVED***exist,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Software***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Document***REMOVED***Short***REMOVED***Notice***REMOVED***should***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***included.
****REMOVED***Notice***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***changes***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***modifications,***REMOVED***through***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***statement***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***new***REMOVED***code***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***document***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***"This***REMOVED***software***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***document***REMOVED***includes***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***copied***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***derived***REMOVED***
from***REMOVED***[title***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***URI***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***document].***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***©***REMOVED***[YEAR]***REMOVED***W3C®***REMOVED***(MIT,***REMOVED***ERCIM,***REMOVED***Keio,***REMOVED***Beihang)."***REMOVED***
Disclaimers
THIS***REMOVED***WORK***REMOVED***IS***REMOVED***PROVIDED***REMOVED***"AS***REMOVED***IS,"***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***COPYRIGHT***REMOVED***HOLDERS***REMOVED***MAKE***REMOVED***NO***REMOVED***REPRESENTATIONS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***WARRANTIES,***REMOVED***EXPRESS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IMPLIED,***REMOVED***INCLUDING***REMOVED***BUT***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***LIMITED***REMOVED***TO,***REMOVED***WARRANTIES***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***MERCHANTABILITY***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***
FITNESS***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***PARTICULAR***REMOVED***PURPOSE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***THAT***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***USE***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***SOFTWARE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***DOCUMENT***REMOVED***WILL***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***INFRINGE***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***THIRD***REMOVED***PARTY***REMOVED***PATENTS,***REMOVED***COPYRIGHTS,***REMOVED***TRADEMARKS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***RIGHTS.
COPYRIGHT***REMOVED***HOLDERS***REMOVED***WILL***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***BE***REMOVED***LIABLE***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***DIRECT,***REMOVED***INDIRECT,***REMOVED***SPECIAL***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***CONSEQUENTIAL***REMOVED***DAMAGES***REMOVED***ARISING***REMOVED***OUT***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***USE***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***SOFTWARE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***DOCUMENT.
The***REMOVED***name***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***trademarks***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***holders***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***used***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***advertising***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***publicity***REMOVED***pertaining***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***work***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***specific,***REMOVED***written***REMOVED***prior***REMOVED***permission.***REMOVED***
Title***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***work***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***times***REMOVED***remain***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***holders.

Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***Corporation***REMOVED***("Creative***REMOVED***Commons")***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***law***REMOVED***firm***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***provide***REMOVED***legal***REMOVED***services***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***legal***REMOVED***advice.***REMOVED***Distribution***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***create***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***lawyer-client***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***relationship.***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***makes***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***related***REMOVED***information***REMOVED***available***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***"as-is"***REMOVED***basis.***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***gives***REMOVED***no***REMOVED***warranties***REMOVED***regarding***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***licenses,***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***their***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***related***REMOVED***information.***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***disclaims***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***liability***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***damages***REMOVED***resulting***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***their***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***fullest***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***possible.***REMOVED***Using***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***Licenses***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***provide***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***standard***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***creators***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***holders***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***share***REMOVED***original***REMOVED***works***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***authorship***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***subject***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***certain***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***specified***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***below.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***considerations***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***informational***REMOVED***purposes***REMOVED***only,***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***exhaustive,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***form***REMOVED***part***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***our***REMOVED***licenses.***REMOVED***Considerations***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***licensors:***REMOVED***Our***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***intended***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***those***REMOVED***authorized***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***give***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***ways***REMOVED***otherwise***REMOVED***restricted***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***certain***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***rights.***REMOVED***Our***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***irrevocable.***REMOVED***Licensors***REMOVED***should***REMOVED***read***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***understand***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***they***REMOVED***choose***REMOVED***before***REMOVED***applying***REMOVED***it.***REMOVED***Licensors***REMOVED***should***REMOVED***also***REMOVED***secure***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***necessary***REMOVED***before***REMOVED***applying***REMOVED***our***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***so***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***can***REMOVED***reuse***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***expected.***REMOVED***Licensors***REMOVED***should***REMOVED***clearly***REMOVED***mark***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***subject***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***license.***REMOVED***This***REMOVED***includes***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***CC-***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***material,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***used***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***exception***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***limitation***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***copyright.***REMOVED***More***REMOVED***considerations***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***licensors:

wiki.creativecommons.org/Considerations_for_licensors***REMOVED***Considerations***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public:***REMOVED***By***REMOVED***using***REMOVED***one***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***our***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***licenses,***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***licensor***REMOVED***grants***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***specified***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***licensor's***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***necessary***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***reason--for***REMOVED***example,***REMOVED***because***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***applicable***REMOVED***exception***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***limitation***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***copyright--then***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***regulated***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***license.***REMOVED***Our***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***grant***REMOVED***only***REMOVED***permissions***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***certain***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***licensor***REMOVED***has***REMOVED***authority***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***grant.***REMOVED***Use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***still***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***restricted***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***reasons,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***because***REMOVED***others***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***material.***REMOVED***A***REMOVED***licensor***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***make***REMOVED***special***REMOVED***requests,***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***asking***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***changes***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***marked***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***described.***REMOVED***Although***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***required***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***our***REMOVED***licenses,***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***encouraged***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***respect***REMOVED***those***REMOVED***requests***REMOVED***where***REMOVED***reasonable.***REMOVED***More_considerations***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public:***REMOVED***wiki.creativecommons.org/Considerations_for_licensees***REMOVED***=======================================================================***REMOVED***
Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***Attribution***REMOVED***4.0***REMOVED***International***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***By***REMOVED***exercising***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***(defined***REMOVED***below),***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***accept***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***agree***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***bound***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***Attribution***REMOVED***4.0***REMOVED***International***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***("Public***REMOVED***License").***REMOVED***To***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***interpreted***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***contract,***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***granted***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***consideration***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***acceptance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***these***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***grants***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***consideration***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***benefits***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***receives***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***making***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***available***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***these***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions.***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***1***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***Definitions.***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***Adapted***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***subject***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***derived***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***based***REMOVED***upon***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***translated,***REMOVED***altered,***REMOVED***arranged,***REMOVED***transformed,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***otherwise***REMOVED***modified***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***manner***REMOVED***requiring***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***held***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***purposes***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License,***REMOVED***where***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***musical***REMOVED***work,***REMOVED***performance,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***sound***REMOVED***recording,***REMOVED***Adapted***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***always***REMOVED***produced***REMOVED***where***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***synched***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***timed***REMOVED***relation***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***moving***REMOVED***image.***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***Adapter's***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***apply***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***contributions***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Adapted***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***accordance***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***c.***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***similar***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***closely***REMOVED***related***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***including,***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***limitation,***REMOVED***performance,***REMOVED***broadcast,***REMOVED***sound***REMOVED***recording,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Sui***REMOVED***Generis***REMOVED***Database***REMOVED***Rights,***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***regard***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***how***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***labeled***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***categorized.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***purposes***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***specified***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***2(b)(1)-(2)***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights.***REMOVED***d.***REMOVED***Effective***REMOVED***Technological***REMOVED***Measures***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***those***REMOVED***measures***REMOVED***that,***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***absence***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***proper***REMOVED***authority,***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***circumvented***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***laws***REMOVED***fulfilling***REMOVED***obligations***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***Article***REMOVED***11***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***WIPO***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***Treaty***REMOVED***adopted***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***December***REMOVED***20,***REMOVED***1996,***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***similar***REMOVED***international***REMOVED***agreements.***REMOVED***e.***REMOVED***Exceptions***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Limitations***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***fair***REMOVED***use,***REMOVED***fair***REMOVED***dealing,***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***exception***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***limitation***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***applies***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material.***REMOVED***f.***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***artistic***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***literary***REMOVED***work,***REMOVED***database,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***applied***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***g.***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***granted***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***subject***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License,***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***limited***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***apply***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***has***REMOVED***authority***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***license.***REMOVED***h.***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***individual(s)***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***entity(ies)***REMOVED***granting***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***i.***REMOVED***Share***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***provide***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***process***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***requires***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights,***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***reproduction,***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***display,***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***performance,***REMOVED***distribution,***REMOVED***dissemination,***REMOVED***communication,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***importation,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***make***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***available***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***ways***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***members***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***access***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***place***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***time***REMOVED***individually***REMOVED***chosen***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***them.***REMOVED***j.***REMOVED***Sui***REMOVED***Generis***REMOVED***Database***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***than***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***resulting***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***Directive***REMOVED***96/9/EC***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***European***REMOVED***Parliament***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Council***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***11***REMOVED***March***REMOVED***1996***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***legal***REMOVED***protection***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***databases,***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***amended***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***succeeded,***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***well***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***essentially***REMOVED***equivalent***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***anywhere***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***world.***REMOVED***k.***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***individual***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***entity***REMOVED***exercising***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***has***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***corresponding***REMOVED***meaning.***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***2***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***Scope.***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***grant.***REMOVED***1.***REMOVED***Subject***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***hereby***REMOVED***grants***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***worldwide,***REMOVED***royalty-free,***REMOVED***non-sublicensable,***REMOVED***non-exclusive,***REMOVED***irrevocable***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***exercise***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***to:***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***reproduce***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Share***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material,***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***whole***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***part;***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***produce,***REMOVED***reproduce,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Share***REMOVED***Adapted***REMOVED***Material.***REMOVED***2.***REMOVED***Exceptions***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Limitations.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***avoidance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***doubt,***REMOVED***where***REMOVED***Exceptions***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Limitations***REMOVED***apply***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***use,***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***apply,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***need***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***comply***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions.***REMOVED***3.***REMOVED***Term.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***term***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***specified***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***6(a).***REMOVED***4.***REMOVED***Media***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***formats;***REMOVED***technical***REMOVED***modifications***REMOVED***allowed.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***authorizes***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***exercise***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***media***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***formats***REMOVED***whether***REMOVED***now***REMOVED***known***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***hereafter***REMOVED***created,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***make***REMOVED***technical***REMOVED***modifications***REMOVED***necessary***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***so.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***waives***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***agrees***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***assert***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***right***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***authority***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***forbid***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***making***REMOVED***technical***REMOVED***modifications***REMOVED***necessary***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***exercise***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***technical***REMOVED***modifications***REMOVED***necessary***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***circumvent***REMOVED***Effective***REMOVED***Technological***REMOVED***Measures.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***purposes***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License,***REMOVED***simply***REMOVED***making***REMOVED***modifications***REMOVED***authorized***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***2(a)***REMOVED***(4)***REMOVED***never***REMOVED***produces***REMOVED***Adapted***REMOVED***Material.***REMOVED***5.***REMOVED***Downstream***REMOVED***recipients.***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***Offer***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material.***REMOVED***Every***REMOVED***recipient***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***automatically***REMOVED***receives***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***offer***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***exercise***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***No***REMOVED***downstream***REMOVED***restrictions.***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***offer***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***impose***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***additional***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***different***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***on,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***apply***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***Effective***REMOVED***Technological***REMOVED***Measures***REMOVED***to,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***doing***REMOVED***so***REMOVED***restricts***REMOVED***exercise***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***recipient***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material.***REMOVED***6.***REMOVED***No***REMOVED***endorsement.***REMOVED***Nothing***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***constitutes***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***construed***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***assert***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***imply***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***are,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***is,***REMOVED***connected***REMOVED***with,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***sponsored,***REMOVED***endorsed,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***granted***REMOVED***official***REMOVED***status***REMOVED***by,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***others***REMOVED***designated***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***receive***REMOVED***attribution***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***provided***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***3(a)(1)(A)(i).***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***Other***REMOVED***rights.***REMOVED***1.***REMOVED***Moral***REMOVED***rights,***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***right***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***integrity,***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License,***REMOVED***nor***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***publicity,***REMOVED***privacy,***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***similar***REMOVED***personality***REMOVED***rights;***REMOVED***however,***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***possible,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***waives***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***agrees***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***assert***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***held***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***limited***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***necessary***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***allow***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***exercise***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights,***REMOVED***but***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***otherwise.***REMOVED***2.***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***trademark***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***3.***REMOVED***To***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***possible,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***waives***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***right***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***collect***REMOVED***royalties***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***exercise***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights,***REMOVED***whether***REMOVED***directly***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***through***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***collecting***REMOVED***society***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***voluntary***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***waivable***REMOVED***statutory***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***compulsory***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***scheme.***REMOVED***In***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***cases***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***reserves***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***right***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***collect***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***royalties.***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***3***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***Conditions.***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***exercise***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***made***REMOVED***subject***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***conditions.***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***Attribution.***REMOVED***1.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***Share***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***(including***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***modified***REMOVED***form),***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***must:***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***retain***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***supplied***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material:***REMOVED***i.***REMOVED***identification***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***creator(s)***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***others***REMOVED***designated***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***receive***REMOVED***attribution,***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***reasonable***REMOVED***manner***REMOVED***requested***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***(including***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***pseudonym***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***designated);***REMOVED***ii.***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***notice;***REMOVED***iii.***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***refers***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License;***REMOVED***iv.***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***refers***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***disclaimer***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***warranties;***REMOVED***v.***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***URI***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***hyperlink***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***reasonably***REMOVED***practicable;***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***indicate***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***modified***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***retain***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***indication***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***previous***REMOVED***modifications;***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***c.***REMOVED***indicate***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***text***REMOVED***of,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***URI***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***hyperlink***REMOVED***to,***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***2.***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***satisfy***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***3(a)(1)***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***reasonable***REMOVED***manner***REMOVED***based***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***medium,***REMOVED***means,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***context***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***Share***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***example,***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***reasonable***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***satisfy***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***providing***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***URI***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***hyperlink***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***resource***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***includes***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***required***REMOVED***information.***REMOVED***3.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***requested***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor,***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***must***REMOVED***remove***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***information***REMOVED***required***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***3(a)(1)(A)***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***reasonably***REMOVED***practicable.***REMOVED***4.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***Share***REMOVED***Adapted***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***produce,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Adapter's***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***apply***REMOVED***must***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***prevent***REMOVED***recipients***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Adapted***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***complying***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***4***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***Sui***REMOVED***Generis***REMOVED***Database***REMOVED***Rights.***REMOVED***Where***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***Sui***REMOVED***Generis***REMOVED***Database***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***apply***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material:***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***avoidance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***doubt,***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***2(a)(1)***REMOVED***grants***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***right***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***extract,***REMOVED***reuse,***REMOVED***reproduce,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Share***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***substantial***REMOVED***portion***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***contents***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***database;***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***substantial***REMOVED***portion***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***database***REMOVED***contents***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***database***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***Sui***REMOVED***Generis***REMOVED***Database***REMOVED***Rights,***REMOVED***then***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***database***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***Sui***REMOVED***Generis***REMOVED***Database***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***(but***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***individual***REMOVED***contents)***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***Adapted***REMOVED***Material;***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***c.***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***must***REMOVED***comply***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***3(a)***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***Share***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***substantial***REMOVED***portion***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***contents***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***database.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***avoidance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***doubt,***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***4***REMOVED***supplements***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***replace***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***obligations***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***where***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights.***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***5***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***Disclaimer***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Warranties***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Limitation***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Liability.***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***UNLESS***REMOVED***OTHERWISE***REMOVED***SEPARATELY***REMOVED***UNDERTAKEN***REMOVED***BY***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***LICENSOR,***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***EXTENT***REMOVED***POSSIBLE,***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***LICENSOR***REMOVED***OFFERS***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***LICENSED***REMOVED***MATERIAL***REMOVED***AS-IS***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***AS-AVAILABLE,***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***MAKES***REMOVED***NO***REMOVED***REPRESENTATIONS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***WARRANTIES***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***KIND***REMOVED***CONCERNING***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***LICENSED***REMOVED***MATERIAL,***REMOVED***WHETHER***REMOVED***EXPRESS,***REMOVED***IMPLIED,***REMOVED***STATUTORY,***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER.***REMOVED***THIS***REMOVED***INCLUDES,***REMOVED***WITHOUT***REMOVED***LIMITATION,***REMOVED***WARRANTIES***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***TITLE,***REMOVED***MERCHANTABILITY,***REMOVED***FITNESS***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***A***REMOVED***PARTICULAR***REMOVED***PURPOSE,***REMOVED***NON-INFRINGEMENT,***REMOVED***ABSENCE***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***LATENT***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***DEFECTS,***REMOVED***ACCURACY,***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***PRESENCE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***ABSENCE***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***ERRORS,***REMOVED***WHETHER***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***KNOWN***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***DISCOVERABLE.***REMOVED***WHERE***REMOVED***DISCLAIMERS***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***WARRANTIES***REMOVED***ARE***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***ALLOWED***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***FULL***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***PART,***REMOVED***THIS***REMOVED***DISCLAIMER***REMOVED***MAY***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***APPLY***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***YOU.***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***EXTENT***REMOVED***POSSIBLE,***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***NO***REMOVED***EVENT***REMOVED***WILL***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***LICENSOR***REMOVED***BE***REMOVED***LIABLE***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***YOU***REMOVED***ON***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***LEGAL***REMOVED***THEORY***REMOVED***(INCLUDING,***REMOVED***WITHOUT***REMOVED***LIMITATION,***REMOVED***NEGLIGENCE)***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHERWISE***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***DIRECT,***REMOVED***SPECIAL,***REMOVED***INDIRECT,***REMOVED***INCIDENTAL,***REMOVED***CONSEQUENTIAL,***REMOVED***PUNITIVE,***REMOVED***EXEMPLARY,***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***LOSSES,***REMOVED***COSTS,***REMOVED***EXPENSES,***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***DAMAGES***REMOVED***ARISING***REMOVED***OUT***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THIS***REMOVED***PUBLIC***REMOVED***LICENSE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***USE***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***LICENSED***REMOVED***MATERIAL,***REMOVED***EVEN***REMOVED***IF***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***LICENSOR***REMOVED***HAS***REMOVED***BEEN***REMOVED***ADVISED***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***POSSIBILITY***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***SUCH***REMOVED***LOSSES,***REMOVED***COSTS,***REMOVED***EXPENSES,***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***DAMAGES.***REMOVED***WHERE***REMOVED***A***REMOVED***LIMITATION***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***LIABILITY***REMOVED***IS***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***ALLOWED***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***FULL***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***PART,***REMOVED***THIS***REMOVED***LIMITATION***REMOVED***MAY***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***APPLY***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***YOU.***REMOVED***c.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***disclaimer***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***warranties***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***limitation***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***liability***REMOVED***provided***REMOVED***above***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***interpreted***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***manner***REMOVED***that,***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***possible,***REMOVED***most***REMOVED***closely***REMOVED***approximates***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***absolute***REMOVED***disclaimer***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***waiver***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***liability.***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***6***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***Term***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Termination.***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***This***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***applies***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***term***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Similar***REMOVED***Rights***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***here.***REMOVED***However,***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***fail***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***comply***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License,***REMOVED***then***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***terminate***REMOVED***automatically.***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***Where***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***right***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***has***REMOVED***terminated***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***6(a),***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***reinstates:***REMOVED***1.***REMOVED***automatically***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***date***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***violation***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***cured,***REMOVED***provided***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***cured***REMOVED***within***REMOVED***30***REMOVED***days***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***discovery***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***violation;***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***2.***REMOVED***upon***REMOVED***express***REMOVED***reinstatement***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***avoidance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***doubt,***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***6(b)***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***affect***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***right***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***seek***REMOVED***remedies***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***Your***REMOVED***violations***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***c.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***avoidance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***doubt,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***also***REMOVED***offer***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***separate***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***stop***REMOVED***distributing***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***time;***REMOVED***however,***REMOVED***doing***REMOVED***so***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***terminate***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***d.***REMOVED***Sections***REMOVED***1,***REMOVED***5,***REMOVED***6,***REMOVED***7,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***8***REMOVED***survive***REMOVED***termination***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***7***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***Other***REMOVED***Terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Conditions.***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***bound***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***additional***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***different***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***communicated***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***unless***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***agreed.***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***Any***REMOVED***arrangements,***REMOVED***understandings,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***agreements***REMOVED***regarding***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***stated***REMOVED***herein***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***separate***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***independent***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***8***REMOVED***--***REMOVED***Interpretation.***REMOVED***a.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***avoidance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***doubt,***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***interpreted***REMOVED***to,***REMOVED***reduce,***REMOVED***limit,***REMOVED***restrict,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***impose***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensed***REMOVED***Material***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***could***REMOVED***lawfully***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***made***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License.***REMOVED***b.***REMOVED***To***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***possible,***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***provision***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***deemed***REMOVED***unenforceable,***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***automatically***REMOVED***reformed***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***minimum***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***necessary***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***make***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***enforceable.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***provision***REMOVED***cannot***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***reformed,***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***severed***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***affecting***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***enforceability***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***remaining***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***conditions.***REMOVED***c.***REMOVED***No***REMOVED***term***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***condition***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***waived***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***no***REMOVED***failure***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***comply***REMOVED***consented***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***unless***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***agreed***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor.***REMOVED***d.***REMOVED***Nothing***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Public***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***constitutes***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***interpreted***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***limitation***REMOVED***upon,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***waiver***REMOVED***of,***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***privileges***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***immunities***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***apply***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Licensor***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***You,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***legal***REMOVED***processes***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***jurisdiction***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***authority.***REMOVED***=======================================================================***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***party***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***licenses.***REMOVED***Notwithstanding,***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***elect***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***apply***REMOVED***one***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***publishes***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***those***REMOVED***instances***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***considered***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***"Licensor."***REMOVED***Except***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***limited***REMOVED***purpose***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***indicating***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***shared***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***otherwise***REMOVED***permitted***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***policies***REMOVED***published***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***creativecommons.org/policies,***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***authorize***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***trademark***REMOVED***"Creative***REMOVED***Commons"***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***trademark***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***logo***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***prior***REMOVED***written***REMOVED***consent***REMOVED***including,***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***limitation,***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***connection***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***unauthorized***REMOVED***modifications***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***arrangements,***REMOVED***understandings,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***agreements***REMOVED***concerning***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***licensed***REMOVED***material.***REMOVED***For***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***avoidance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***doubt,***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***paragraph***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***form***REMOVED***part***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***public***REMOVED***licenses.***REMOVED***Creative***REMOVED***Commons***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***contacted***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***creativecommons.org.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------Web***REMOVED***Background***REMOVED***Synchronization------------------------------

Web***REMOVED***Background***REMOVED***Synchronization***REMOVED***Specification
Portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***spec***REMOVED***©***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***W3C

W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***Final***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***Agreement***REMOVED***
To***REMOVED***secure***REMOVED***commitments***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***participants***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***full***REMOVED***text***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***Business***REMOVED***Group***REMOVED***Report,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***group***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***call***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***voluntary***REMOVED***commitments***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***terms;***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***"summary"***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***
available.***REMOVED***See***REMOVED***also***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***related***REMOVED***"W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***Contributor***REMOVED***License***REMOVED***Agreement".
1.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***Purpose***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Agreement.
This***REMOVED***Agreement***REMOVED***sets***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***make***REMOVED***certain***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***available***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***your***REMOVED***implementation***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***
Any***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***capitalized***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***specifically***REMOVED***defined***REMOVED***herein***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***same***REMOVED***meaning***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***those***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***"W3C***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***Policy",***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***defined***REMOVED***there,***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***"W3C***REMOVED***Process***REMOVED***Document".
2.***REMOVED***Copyrights.***REMOVED***
2.1.***REMOVED***Copyright***REMOVED***Grant.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***grant***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***perpetual***REMOVED***(for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***duration***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***applicable***REMOVED***copyright),***REMOVED***worldwide,***REMOVED***non-exclusive,***REMOVED***no-charge,***REMOVED***royalty-free,***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***license,***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***obligation***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***accounting***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***me,***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***reproduce,***REMOVED***prepare***REMOVED***derivative***REMOVED***works***REMOVED***of,***REMOVED***publicly***REMOVED***display,***REMOVED***publicly***REMOVED***perform,***REMOVED***sublicense,***REMOVED***distribute,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***implement***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***full***REMOVED***extent***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***my***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***interest***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***
2.2.***REMOVED***Attribution.***REMOVED***As***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***condition***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***grant,***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***must***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***attribution***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***derivative***REMOVED***work***REMOVED***you***REMOVED***make***REMOVED***based***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***That***REMOVED***attribution***REMOVED***must***REMOVED***include,***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***minimum,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***name***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***version***REMOVED***number.
3.***REMOVED***Patents.***REMOVED***
3.1.***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***Licensing***REMOVED***Commitment.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***agree***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***my***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***RF***REMOVED***Licensing***REMOVED***Requirements.***REMOVED***This***REMOVED***requirement***REMOVED***includes***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***own***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***right***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***without***REMOVED***obligation***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***payment***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***consideration***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***unrelated***REMOVED***third***REMOVED***party.***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***RF***REMOVED***Licensing***REMOVED***Requirements***REMOVED***obligations***REMOVED***made***REMOVED***concerning***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***described***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***policy***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***binding***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***me***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***life***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***patents***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***question***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***encumber***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***patents***REMOVED***containing***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims,***REMOVED***regardless***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***changes***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***participation***REMOVED***status***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Membership.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***also***REMOVED***agree***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***my***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***RF***REMOVED***Licensing***REMOVED***Requirements***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***derivative***REMOVED***works***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***so***REMOVED***long***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***normative***REMOVED***portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***maintained***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***commitment***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***extend***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***portion***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***derivative***REMOVED***work***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***was***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***included***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.
3.2.***REMOVED***Optional,***REMOVED***Additional***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***Grant.***REMOVED***In***REMOVED***addition***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***provisions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***3.1,***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***also,***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***my***REMOVED***option,***REMOVED***make***REMOVED***certain***REMOVED***intellectual***REMOVED***property***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***infringed***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***implementations***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims,***REMOVED***available***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***providing***REMOVED***those***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***via***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Web***REMOVED***site.
4.***REMOVED***No***REMOVED***Other***REMOVED***Rights.***REMOVED***Except***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***specifically***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Agreement,***REMOVED***no***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***express***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***implied***REMOVED***patent,***REMOVED***trademark,***REMOVED***copyright,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***property***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***granted***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Agreement,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***implication,***REMOVED***waiver,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***estoppel.
5.***REMOVED***Antitrust***REMOVED***Compliance.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***acknowledge***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***compete***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***participants,***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***am***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***no***REMOVED***obligation***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***implement***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification,***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***each***REMOVED***participant***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***free***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***develop***REMOVED***competing***REMOVED***technologies***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***standards,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***each***REMOVED***party***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***free***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***its***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***third***REMOVED***parties,***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***purpose***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***enabling***REMOVED***competing***REMOVED***technologies***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***standards.
6.***REMOVED***Non-Circumvention.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***agree***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***intentionally***REMOVED***take***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***willfully***REMOVED***assist***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***third***REMOVED***party***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***take***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***action***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***purpose***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***circumventing***REMOVED***my***REMOVED***obligations***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Agreement.
7.***REMOVED***Transition***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Recommendation***REMOVED***Track.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***developed***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Project***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***transition***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Recommendation***REMOVED***Track.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Team***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***responsible***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***notifying***REMOVED***me***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group***REMOVED***has***REMOVED***been***REMOVED***chartered.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***no***REMOVED***obligation***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***join***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***developed***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Project***REMOVED***transitions***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Recommendation***REMOVED***Track,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***apply:***REMOVED***
7.1.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***join***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***join***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group,***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***subject***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***rules,***REMOVED***obligations,***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***commitments,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***policies***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***govern***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group.
7.2.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***Do***REMOVED***Not***REMOVED***Join***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group.***REMOVED***
7.2.1.***REMOVED***Licensing***REMOVED***Obligations***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***Resulting***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***join***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group,***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***agree***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***offer***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***licenses***REMOVED***according***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Royalty-Free***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***requirements***REMOVED***described***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***5***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***Policy***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***included***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***resulting***REMOVED***Recommendation.***REMOVED***This***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***commitment***REMOVED***does***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***extend***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***portion***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***implementation***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Recommendation***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***was***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***included***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***This***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***commitment***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***revoked***REMOVED***but***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***modified***REMOVED***through***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***exclusion***REMOVED***process***REMOVED***defined***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***4***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***Policy.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***am***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***required***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***join***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***exclude***REMOVED***patents***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***the***REMOV
