ED***W3C***REMOVED***Royalty-Free***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***commitment,***REMOVED***but***REMOVED***must***REMOVED***otherwise***REMOVED***follow***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***normal***REMOVED***exclusion***REMOVED***procedures***REMOVED***defined***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***Policy.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Team***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***notify***REMOVED***me***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***Call***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***Exclusion***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***4.5***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***Policy.
7.2.2.***REMOVED***No***REMOVED***Disclosure***REMOVED***Obligation.***REMOVED***If***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***join***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group,***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***no***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***disclosure***REMOVED***obligations***REMOVED***outside***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***those***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***6***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Patent***REMOVED***Policy.
8.***REMOVED***Conflict***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Interest.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***disclose***REMOVED***significant***REMOVED***relationships***REMOVED***when***REMOVED***those***REMOVED***relationships***REMOVED***might***REMOVED***reasonably***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***perceived***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***creating***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***conflict***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***interest***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***my***REMOVED***role.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***notify***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***change***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***my***REMOVED***affiliation***REMOVED***using***REMOVED***W3C-provided***REMOVED***mechanisms.
9.***REMOVED***Representations,***REMOVED***Warranties***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***Disclaimers.***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***represent***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***warrant***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***am***REMOVED***legally***REMOVED***entitled***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***grant***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***promises***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Agreement.***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***ALL***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***RESPECTS***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***SPECIFICATION***REMOVED***IS***REMOVED***PROVIDED***REMOVED***“AS***REMOVED***IS.”***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***entire***REMOVED***risk***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***implementing***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***otherwise***REMOVED***using***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***assumed***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***implementer***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***user.***REMOVED***Except***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***stated***REMOVED***herein,***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***disclaim***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***warranties***REMOVED***(express,***REMOVED***implied,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***otherwise),***REMOVED***including***REMOVED***implied***REMOVED***warranties***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***merchantability,***REMOVED***non-infringement,***REMOVED***fitness***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***particular***REMOVED***purpose,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***title,***REMOVED***related***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***NO***REMOVED***EVENT***REMOVED***WILL***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***PARTY***REMOVED***BE***REMOVED***LIABLE***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***PARTY***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***LOST***REMOVED***PROFITS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***FORM***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***INDIRECT,***REMOVED***SPECIAL,***REMOVED***INCIDENTAL,***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***CONSEQUENTIAL***REMOVED***DAMAGES***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***CHARACTER***REMOVED***FROM***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***CAUSES***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***ACTION***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***KIND***REMOVED***WITH***REMOVED***RESPECT***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***THIS***REMOVED***AGREEMENT,***REMOVED***WHETHER***REMOVED***BASED***REMOVED***ON***REMOVED***BREACH***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***CONTRACT,***REMOVED***TORT***REMOVED***(INCLUDING***REMOVED***NEGLIGENCE),***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHERWISE,***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***WHETHER***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***PARTY***REMOVED***HAS***REMOVED***BEEN***REMOVED***ADVISED***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***POSSIBILITY***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***SUCH***REMOVED***DAMAGE.***REMOVED***All***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***my***REMOVED***obligations***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***3***REMOVED***regarding***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***transfer,***REMOVED***successors***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***interest,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***assignment***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***Granted***REMOVED***Claims***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***satisfied***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***notify***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***transferee***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***assignee***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***know***REMOVED***contains***REMOVED***Granted***REMOVED***Claims***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***obligations***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***Section***REMOVED***3.***REMOVED***Nothing***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Agreement***REMOVED***requires***REMOVED***me***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***undertake***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***search.
10.***REMOVED***Definitions.***REMOVED***
10.1.***REMOVED***Agreement.***REMOVED***“Agreement”***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***Final***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***Agreement.
10.2.***REMOVED***Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group.***REMOVED***“Corresponding***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group”***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Working***REMOVED***Group***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***chartered***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***develop***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***Recommendation,***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***defined***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Process***REMOVED***Document,***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***takes***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***input.
10.3.***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims.***REMOVED***“Essential***REMOVED***Claims”***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***mean***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***claims***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***application***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***jurisdiction***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***world***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***would***REMOVED***necessarily***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***infringed***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***implementation***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***A***REMOVED***claim***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***necessarily***REMOVED***infringed***REMOVED***hereunder***REMOVED***only***REMOVED***when***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***possible***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***avoid***REMOVED***infringing***REMOVED***it***REMOVED***because***REMOVED***there***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***no***REMOVED***non-infringing***REMOVED***alternative***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***implementing***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***normative***REMOVED***portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***Existence***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***non-infringing***REMOVED***alternative***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***judged***REMOVED***based***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***state***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***art***REMOVED***at***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***time***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***publication***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***excluded***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***deemed***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***constitute***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims:***REMOVED***
10.3.1.***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***claims***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***than***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***above***REMOVED***even***REMOVED***if***REMOVED***contained***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***same***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims;***REMOVED***and
10.3.2.***REMOVED***claims***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***would***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***infringed***REMOVED***only***REMOVED***by:***REMOVED***
portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***implementation***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***specified***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***normative***REMOVED***portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification,***REMOVED***or
enabling***REMOVED***technologies***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***necessary***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***make***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***product***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***portion***REMOVED***thereof***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***complies***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***themselves***REMOVED***expressly***REMOVED***set***REMOVED***forth***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***(e.g.,***REMOVED***semiconductor***REMOVED***manufacturing***REMOVED***technology,***REMOVED***compiler***REMOVED***technology,***REMOVED***object-oriented***REMOVED***technology,***REMOVED***basic***REMOVED***operating***REMOVED***system***REMOVED***technology,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***like);***REMOVED***or
the***REMOVED***implementation***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***technology***REMOVED***developed***REMOVED***elsewhere***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***merely***REMOVED***incorporated***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***reference***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***body***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification.
10.3.3.***REMOVED***design***REMOVED***patents***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***design***REMOVED***registrations.
For***REMOVED***purposes***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***definition,***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***normative***REMOVED***portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***deemed***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***only***REMOVED***architectural***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***interoperability***REMOVED***requirements.***REMOVED***Optional***REMOVED***features***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***RFC***REMOVED***2119***REMOVED***sense***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***considered***REMOVED***normative***REMOVED***unless***REMOVED***they***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***specifically***REMOVED***identified***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***informative.***REMOVED***Implementation***REMOVED***examples***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***material***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***merely***REMOVED***illustrate***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***requirements***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***informative,***REMOVED***rather***REMOVED***than***REMOVED***normative.
10.4.***REMOVED***I,***REMOVED***Me,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***My.***REMOVED***“I,”***REMOVED***“me,”***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***“my”***REMOVED***refers***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***signatory.
10.5***REMOVED***Project.***REMOVED***“Project”***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***Group***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***Business***REMOVED***Group***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***I***REMOVED***executed***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Agreement.
10.6.***REMOVED***Specification.***REMOVED***“Specification”***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***identified***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Project***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***target***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***agreement***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***call***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***Final***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***Commitments.***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***provide***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***authoritative***REMOVED***mechanisms***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***identification***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Specification.
10.7.***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***RF***REMOVED***Licensing***REMOVED***Requirements.***REMOVED***“W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***RF***REMOVED***Licensing***REMOVED***Requirements”***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***mean***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***non-assignable,***REMOVED***non-sublicensable***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***make,***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***made,***REMOVED***use,***REMOVED***sell,***REMOVED***have***REMOVED***sold,***REMOVED***offer***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***sell,***REMOVED***import,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***distribute***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***dispose***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***implementations***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***that:***REMOVED***
10.7.1.***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***available***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***all,***REMOVED***worldwide,***REMOVED***whether***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***they***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Members;
10.7.2.***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***extend***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims***REMOVED***owned***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***controlled***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***me;
10.7.3.***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***limited***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***implementations***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***what***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***required***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification;
10.7.4.***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***conditioned***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***grant***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***reciprocal***REMOVED***RF***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***(as***REMOVED***defined***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***policy)***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***Essential***REMOVED***Claims***REMOVED***owned***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***controlled***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***licensee.***REMOVED***A***REMOVED***reciprocal***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***required***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***available***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***all,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***reciprocal***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***itself***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***conditioned***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***further***REMOVED***reciprocal***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***all.
10.7.5.***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***conditioned***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***payment***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***royalties,***REMOVED***fees***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***consideration;
10.7.6.***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***suspended***REMOVED***with***REMOVED***respect***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***licensee***REMOVED***when***REMOVED***licensor***REMOVED***issued***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***licensee***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***infringement***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***claims***REMOVED***essential***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***implement***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Recommendation;
10.7.7.***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***impose***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***further***REMOVED***conditions***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***restrictions***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***use***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***technology,***REMOVED***intellectual***REMOVED***property***REMOVED***rights,***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***restrictions***REMOVED***on***REMOVED***behavior***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***licensee,***REMOVED***but***REMOVED***may***REMOVED***include***REMOVED***reasonable,***REMOVED***customary***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***relating***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***operation***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***maintenance***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***relationship***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***following:***REMOVED***choice***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***law***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***dispute***REMOVED***resolution;
10.7.8.***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***considered***REMOVED***accepted***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***implementer***REMOVED***who***REMOVED***manifests***REMOVED***an***REMOVED***intent***REMOVED***not***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***accept***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***terms***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***W3C***REMOVED***Community***REMOVED***RF***REMOVED***Licensing***REMOVED***Requirements***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***offered***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***licensor.
10.7.9.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***RF***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***conforming***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***requirements***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***policy***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***made***REMOVED***available***REMOVED***by***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***licensor***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***long***REMOVED***as***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Specification***REMOVED***is***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***effect.***REMOVED***The***REMOVED***term***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***license***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***for***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***life***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***patents***REMOVED***in***REMOVED***question.
I***REMOVED***am***REMOVED***encouraged***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***provide***REMOVED***a***REMOVED***contact***REMOVED***from***REMOVED***which***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***information***REMOVED***can***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***obtained***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***other***REMOVED***relevant***REMOVED***licensing***REMOVED***information.***REMOVED***Any***REMOVED***such***REMOVED***information***REMOVED***will***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***made***REMOVED***publicly***REMOVED***available.***REMOVED***
10.8.***REMOVED***You***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***Your.***REMOVED***“You,”***REMOVED***“you,”***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***“your”***REMOVED***means***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***person***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***entity***REMOVED***who***REMOVED***exercises***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***patent***REMOVED***rights***REMOVED***granted***REMOVED***under***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***Agreement,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***any***REMOVED***person***REMOVED***that***REMOVED***person***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***entity***REMOVED***controls.

distribute,***REMOVED***sublicense,***REMOVED***and/or***REMOVED***sell***REMOVED***copies***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Materials,***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***to
permit***REMOVED***persons***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***whom***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Materials***REMOVED***are***REMOVED***furnished***REMOVED***to***REMOVED***do***REMOVED***so,***REMOVED***subject***REMOVED***to
the***REMOVED***following***REMOVED***conditions:

The***REMOVED***above***REMOVED***copyright***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***and***REMOVED***this***REMOVED***permission***REMOVED***notice***REMOVED***shall***REMOVED***be***REMOVED***included
in***REMOVED***all***REMOVED***copies***REMOVED***or***REMOVED***substantial***REMOVED***portions***REMOVED***of***REMOVED***the***REMOVED***Materials.

THE***REMOVED***MATERIALS***REMOVED***ARE***REMOVED***PROVIDED***REMOVED***"AS***REMOVED***IS",***REMOVED***WITHOUT***REMOVED***WARRANTY***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***ANY***REMOVED***KIND,
EXPRESS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IMPLIED,***REMOVED***INCLUDING***REMOVED***BUT***REMOVED***NOT***REMOVED***LIMITED***REMOVED***TO***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***WARRANTIES***REMOVED***OF
MERCHANTABILITY,***REMOVED***FITNESS***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***A***REMOVED***PARTICULAR***REMOVED***PURPOSE***REMOVED***AND***REMOVED***NONINFRINGEMENT.
IN***REMOVED***NO***REMOVED***EVENT***REMOVED***SHALL***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***AUTHORS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***COPYRIGHT***REMOVED***HOLDERS***REMOVED***BE***REMOVED***LIABLE***REMOVED***FOR***REMOVED***ANY
CLAIM,***REMOVED***DAMAGES***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***LIABILITY,***REMOVED***WHETHER***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***AN***REMOVED***ACTION***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***CONTRACT,
TORT***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHERWISE,***REMOVED***ARISING***REMOVED***FROM,***REMOVED***OUT***REMOVED***OF***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***CONNECTION***REMOVED***WITH***REMOVED***THE
MATERIALS***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***USE***REMOVED***OR***REMOVED***OTHER***REMOVED***DEALINGS***REMOVED***IN***REMOVED***THE***REMOVED***MATERIALS.
